A little clarification: Although this bugzilla form specifies the VCM component
as the source of the problem, it actually occurred when the new TEAM support was
activated.

I got exactly the same walkback on the Motif build 20020214 today, but it
occurred at a different time.

I believe this is now fixed. Please reopen if you see this after the next
integration build.
